dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor and control your network protection

testing.title: Testing
testing.subtitle: Check proxies and strategies for functionality

general.title: General Settings
general.minimizeToTrayDesc: Minimize to system tray when closing

routing.title: Routing Settings
routing.perAppRoutingDesc: Route traffic from specific applications through DPI bypass

hotkeys.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
hotkeys.helpText: Click on a shortcut to change it. Press the new key combination, then release. Use Ctrl, Alt, or Shift with any key.

hostlists.title: Hostlists
hostlists.subtitle: Manage domain lists for DPI bypass
hostlists.allUpToDate: All hostlists are up to date
hostlists.helpText: Hostlists contain domains that are processed by DPI bypass strategies. Updates are fetched from GitHub repositories with the latest domain lists.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.blockQuicDesc: Block UDP/443 to force TCP connections
advanced.backupDesc: Export or import your configuration (settings, proxies, routing rules)
advanced.backupNote: Note: Passwords are not exported for security reasons. You'll need to re-enter them after import.
advanced.expertWarning: Change these settings only if you understand what they do. Incorrect configuration may cause connection issues or system instability.
advanced.tcpTimestampsDesc: Enable RFC 1323 timestamps (may help bypass some DPI)
advanced.dnsOverrideDesc: Custom DNS server (leave empty for system default)

messages.noNewData: No new data to import (all items already exist)

diagnostics.title: System Diagnostics
diagnostics.subtitle: Check system components and network health

orchestra.title: Orchestra
orchestra.subtitle: Automatic strategy optimization and learning center
